MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH1 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Victoria Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.12pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Candlemaker Row substation and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.10pm on Thursday 11th March 2021.
